titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards Cards are NOT in chronological order s1: Dec 2 = "Propak"? s2: March 29 = "Porterism"? Nov 29 = "Drama and the hero" or "Dame and the hen"? Dec 7 = no idea, crossed out difficult to read s3: Dec 23 = "trnola"? s6: Sept 5 = "Gasker's"? s7: Jan 13 = "Bertrants"? s8: April 6 = "Sun"? s9: April 15 = "Mamage"? July 19 = "Golwin"? (Godwin?) Aug 17 = "Rye"? "Ale"? s10: Sept 17 = "racs"? Sept 22 = "Jusqe"? s13: July 27 = "Grand"? Sept 11 = "Messages"? Sept 13 = "hyphena"? s14: Oct 4 = "Haxs Frost"? Nov 22 = "Jinner"? s15: June 22 = "Allaid"? July 13 = "Eduard"? July 31 = "Willhelm"? s16: Oct 5 = "Polletism"? s17: Feb 27 = "Geagie"? April 13 = "freak for"? s18: Renewed = no idea, letter in abbrev "AL_" s19: Sept 14 = "Chree"? s21: Nov 12 = "ldevandiau"? Dec 3 = "Cactus"? s22: Dec 17 = "Austay"? Feb 2 = no idea Feb 4 = "Fry of Joy"? Feb 21 = "Monkey"? and no idea Feb 27 = "locations"? s24: Jan 16 = "Probert"? s25: May 10 = "Sunny"? or "Jenny"? s26: Duplicate of s24 s27: Aug 1 = "Ostnekoff"? s29: Aug 30 = "Stories"? Oct 25 = "Winelius" Nov 12 = no idea s30: June 26 = "Ideahe"? June 28 = "Avay"? Aug 28 = no idea Aug 30 = no idea s31: Oct 16 = faint note pointing to "House of the 4 Winds" = date covered by tape s32: Nov 30 = "Inland"? Dec 9 = "The Near"? s33: = tape over renewal date Feb 27 = no idea March 2 = "Peirsuer"? March 12 = no idea March 21 = "Santa"? s34: covered with tape May 20 = "Exhale"? return date covered with tape return date covered with tap s35: Aug 8 = number, can't read Aug 27 = "Jan"? "Tar"? s36: return date under tape return date under tape Oct 24 = "Corniry"? s37: Dec 18 = overwritten first word, can't read s39: July 3 = "Mudugh"? July 31 = "Stepfather Loure"? s40: June 8 = "Pablerism"? s41: Aug 1 = "Gengi Grifter"? s43: Dec 31 = "Ryeeman"? s45: Dec 10 = first title crossed out, "? House"? s47: June 27 = "Sevipe Ahlly"? s51: July 5 = no idea July 22 = no idea July 27 = no idea July 28 = "lunaticism"? s52: March 4 = no idea
